newsitem.title: FINLAND: LSO FOODS, POUTTU SET JOINT SLAUGHTERING HOUSE.
newsitem.headline: LSO FOODS, POUTTU SET JOINT SLAUGHTERING HOUSE.

text.p: Finnish cooperative-owned meat product group LSO Foods Oy said in a statement on Friday it would start joint slaughtering operations with family-owned Pouttu Oy.
"Through cooperation, the companies can better ensure the supply of domestic meat raw material," LSO said.
The joint slaughtering operations will be located in Pouttu's slaughtering house in Outokumpu and in LSO's slaughtering house in Forssa, it said.
The companies will establish a 50-50 joint venture Pouttu Foods Oy to run the slaughtering house in Outokumpu.
LSO has previously been buying its beef raw material from Pouttu, it said.
